tweet: The Senate passed an overwhelmingly bipartisan bill by a margin of 84-8 to address the humanitarian crisis at our southern border. I urge @SpeakerPelosi to bring this bill to the floor for a vote. #endthecrisis pic.twitter.com/op1ANyXhr8

On Floor to recognize the hardworking #students, #teachers & staff of #Dubois Area Middle School who for the 4th consecutive time was named a #SchoolToWatch.  This week they were recognized for their 12 years of excellence at the National Forum’s Schools to Watch Conference in DC – at Floor of The House of Representatives

On Floor to speak about the #School Food Modernization Act which would help America’s school cafeterias modernize its equipment & infrastructure I proudly introduced this week with @RepDeSaulnier – at U.S. House of Representatives

On Floor to recognize the passage of the 19th amendment in 1919 providing for women the #RightToVote.  #Pennsylvania was a center of women’s rights when Lucretia Mott organized the Philadelphia Female Ant-Slavery Society in 1833. – at U.S. House of Representatives

On Floor to recognize Dr. Michael Messina, #PennState head of the Department of Exosystem Science & Management on his retirement this week. On Floor to recognize Cindy Lam of #DuboisAreaHighSchool who is the winner of the #PA15 Congressional Art Competition with her artwork titled “Self” in a prisms-colored pencil drawing.  Congratulations and thank you for sharing your talent! – at Floor of The House of Representatives

Today marks the 100th anniversary of Pennsylvania ratifying the #19thAmendment to the United States Constitution, which ultimately gave American women the right to vote. On June 24, 1919, Pennsylvania became the seventh state to ratify women's suffrage.

On Floor to recognize June as #Alzheimers & Brain Awareness Month.  Alzheimer’s is the 6th leading cause of death in the United States & it has reached crisis proportions.  I urge my colleagues to cosponsor the Younger-Onset Alzheimer's Act of 2019 – at Floor of The House of Representatives
On Floor to raise awareness for those suffering from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder #PTSD #PTSDAwareness – at Floor of The House of Representatives
